1.0.0.name: wordpress/tweetpaste-embed
1.0.0.description:
This is a WordPress plugin created to allow users to paste tweets directly into blog posts and pages.

It uses the TweetPaste API to obtain a block, formatted in a similar way to twitter.com updates.

Tweets can be embedded using a simple shortcode, and there are a number of options available to customise the look of the blocks.
